name: GraalOnline Classic+
description:
Download Graalonline Classic+ for free! Also check out GraalOnline Zone+ and GraalOnline Era+ which are free for a limited time!

Welcome to GraalOnline Classic, an MMORPG with retro-look! Play with thousands of players world-wide, explore the world and use various weapons such as bombs and bow. You can customize your character, chat with other players and send messages to friends. The game comes with everything that made GraalOnline an evergreen of online games, including more than 15 music tracks.

This Plus version includes the "Customization Pack" and "House Pack". You can use more than 1000 different looks for your head, many hats, shields, swords and suits! Build your own house, place furniture and invite your friends!

Works with Internet
